title: Antalya State Symphony Orchestra
text:
The Antalya State Symphony Orchestra is an orchestra located in Antalya.
Founded in 1995 as Antalya Chamber Orchestra later became symphony orchestra in 1997. Orchestra's first principal conductor was Inci Özdil, the first woman conductor of Turkey. After Inci Ozdil, Gürer Aykal became the principal conductor in 1999.  The orchestra gave its first concert at December 6th, 1999. Since 1999, the  orchestra gives regular concerts at Atatürk Cultural Center (Antalya).
